keyMappings:
unmap v
map ' toggleMuteTab all
map " toggleMuteTab other
map yt createTab https://www.youtube.com
map vk createTab https://www.vk.com
map 1 createTab https://e.mail.ru/inbox/
map 2 createTab https://www.vocabulary.com/play/
searchEngines:
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Images
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
gd: https://www.google.com/search?q=define+%s
recent: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:y&q=%s Google (last year only)
gt: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Google Translator
ya: https://yandex.ru/search/?text=%s Yandex
di: http://dictionary.com/browse/%s
th: http://thesaurus.com/browse/%s
dg: http://www.discogs.com/search?q=%s&type=all
we: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia (en)
wr: https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia (ru)
wk: https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s&go=Go
git: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
hn: https://www.hnsearch.com/search#request/submissions&q=%s&start=0 HackerNews
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow
su: https://superuser.com/search?q=%s SuperUser
ud: https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=%s UrbanDictionary
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
imdb: https://www.imdb.com/find?s=all&q=%s IMDB
tw: https://twitter.com/search?q=%s&vertical=default&f=tweets
rd: https://www.reddit.com/search?q=%s
rt: https://rutracker.org/forum/tracker.php?nm=%s rutracker
pb: https://www.pirate-bay.net/search?q=%s piratebay
fl: https://flibusta.is/booksearch?ask=%s flibusta
gl: http://gen.lib.rus.ec/search.php?req=%s&lg_topic=libgen&open=0&view=simple&res=25&phrase=1&column=def genlibrusec genlibrusec
fv: https://forvo.com/word/%s/#en forvo

# Use google to search the current site you're on
site: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'
